{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3594891,"name":"Murilo Miranda Santos","username":"murilo404","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/49beb7/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-04-17T16:20:50.970Z","cooked":"

Good morning! When i try to set up de static IP from limelight 3g, its show a message to Power Cycle the limelight. When i reset the limelight, it’s doesn’t take effect, and the ip dont changes.

Sorry for my english, im brazilian

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2025-04-17T16:20:50.970Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":43,"readers_count":42,"score":13.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":499606,"topic_slug":"how-to-set-the-limelight-3g-static-ip","display_username":"Murilo Miranda Santos","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":69705,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/how-to-set-the-limelight-3g-static-ip/499606/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3594897,"name":"Zeke","username":"ET-Hendrix","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/et-hendrix/{size}/242233_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-17T16:29:45.798Z","cooked":"

Hello! I’ve come across this problem before, here are some quick suggestions:

  1. make sure you flashed your limelight to the most recent update version.

  2. When it says to power cycle, that means you should turn off your robot with the limelight in the robot, and then power the robot back on. When you check, the limelight IP should be updated.
